sentences.english: In heat transfer experiment, the calorie comparison theory and naphthalene sublimation technology are adopted.

sentences.english: Xylene and decalin are better solvents than the others.
sentences.chinese: 二甲苯和十氫萘是較好的溶劑。

sentences.english: A marble - sized ball, originally of camphor but now of naphthalene, stored with clothes to repel moths.

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of menadiol sodium diphosphate induced mutation.

sentences.english: However, any substitution on the naphthyl ring decreased the bioactivity.
sentences.chinese: 但若萘環上有取代基，將大大降低其生物活性。

sentences.english: This paper introduced the use of tar oil mixture as raw material in the production of naphthalene.

sentences.english: The p dichlorobenzene and naphthalene in mothproofing agent was determined by infrared spectroscopy.

sentences.english: T lymphocytes and its subpopulations were determined by Alpha napthyl acetate esterase staining.

sentences.english: Phthalic anhydride residue is the by product from oxidation of naphthalene oro xylene.

sentences.english: The side chain structure of the β-alkyl naphthalenes studied influences significantly their way of dehydrocyclization.

sentences.english: Among hydrogen donors tested, tetralin has the biggest effect on super heavy oil aqua-thermolysis.
